document.full_text: g8 leaders all back french finance minister christine lagarde's bid to run the imf, foreign minister alain juppe said sunday, as she attacked a call to investigate her role in a 2008 legal case that may harm her chances.
document.title: lagarde has g8 backing
lines_and_colors: g8 leaders all back french finance minister christine lagarde's bid to run the imf, foreign minister alain juppe said sunday, as she attacked a call to investigate her role in a 2008 legal case that may harm her chances.
